data.title: Musical Artists Like Kerli?
data.meta_description: Hey, I was wondering if any of you listen to other musical artists that sound similar to Kerli. on Pandora Radio Kerli other artists like Imogen Heap, Lily Alle
data.text:
by loonylovegood Tue Jun 08, 2010 9:50 am

Hey, I was wondering if any of you listen to other musical artists that sound similar to Kerli. on Pandora Radio Kerli other artists like Imogen Heap, Lily Allen and A Fine Frenzy show up, but I was wondering if any of you listen to any artists, preferrably from a country other that the US, that are similar to Kerli. thanks!

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Lilee Tue Jun 08, 2010 3:25 pm

Emilie Autumn and Kanon Wakeshima come to mind when I think of artists like Kerli. They're not all that similar, but that's just what comes to my mind ^^;

Edit: Oh, and Iirisk Vesik xD

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Guest Tue Jun 08, 2010 5:06 pm

yeah, I have to agree with Emilie Autumn too--their music styles are pretty different, but they both are very artistic and have very defined concepts with their music.

There is a really unknown Japanese band called Antihoney, that makes very industrial-ambiance style fairy-tale like music...that sounds like a really bizarre combination, but the sound they make is really unique and cool...kind of reminds me of Kerli's ambiance stuff...here's their website if you're interested:

http://antihoney.com/index.html

just click "music" and you can listen to all of their songs there. i'd suggest "dove"--it's one of my favorites.

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Lilee Tue Jun 08, 2010 8:19 pm

deadkittyxo wrote:yeah, I have to agree with Emilie Autumn too--their music styles are pretty different, but they both are very artistic and have very defined concepts with their music.

There is a really unknown Japanese band called Antihoney, that makes very industrial-ambiance style fairy-tale like music...that sounds like a really bizarre combination, but the sound they make is really unique and cool...kind of reminds me of Kerli's ambiance stuff...here's their website if you're interested:

http://antihoney.com/index.html

just click "music" and you can listen to all of their songs there. i'd suggest "dove"--it's one of my favorites.

Antihoney sounds cute <3 Very pretty and ambient.

Sellyy Her image is very Kerli, her music is more goth I think and not in English. She's from Austria I believe.

http://sellyy.at

Yeah, one of Sellyy's music videos has a very "Walking on Air" type feel to it. Very dark and artistic.

by Dawty Wed Jun 09, 2010 11:07 am

loonylovegood wrote:Hey, I was wondering if any of you listen to other musical artists that sound similar to Kerli. on Pandora Radio Kerli other artists like Imogen Heap, Lily Allen and A Fine Frenzy show up, but I was wondering if any of you listen to any artists, preferrably from a country other that the US, that are similar to Kerli. thanks!

Lily is my favorite artist, and i love Imogen Heap as well! Have any of you listened to Little Boots? Her imagery and (some) of her music reminds me of Kerli, especially songs like "Hearts Collide", "Symmetry", and "Earthquake"

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Guest Sun Jun 13, 2010 8:04 am

When i think of a person like Kerli i would say a little bit of Lady Gaga like Kerli was before Lady Gaga and some think Lady Gaga was before Kerli witch isnt true. Some of my friends that just now herd of Kerli say she stole Lady Gaga's look and style witch isnt true. I see complete differents between both there music but they both are light haired and dark creepy meaningful music. and there both Extremely Creative.

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Gretta Sun Jun 13, 2010 8:35 am

I'd say Bjork sounds alike to Kerli but I guess that's cuz Bjork was Kerli's "inspiration"

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Krissy Sun Jun 13, 2010 8:56 am

I really think Lady Gaga is totally different then kerli.

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Poetic Sun Jun 13, 2010 10:03 am

Gaga and Kerli have COMPLETELY different style, music-wise. But they are both very unique and have quite an image. And they have a wild sense of style. Plus near identical hair doesn't help.

Personally, I think Amy Lee mixing with Bjork is pretty close to Kerli.

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Guest Sun Jun 13, 2010 10:32 am

While Kerli has a fairytale element, Iiris is kinda E.T., austronauts and space, but they're really similar, I guess.

I also like Selly, her label put walking on air and kerli as tags on her music video.

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

by Lilee Sun Jun 13, 2010 10:50 am

I think the review on iTunes compared Kerli to Amy Lee and Bjork xD Bjork maybe, but I wouldn't say Amy Lee. They're two different genres and vocal styles.

Re: Musical Artists Like Kerli?

totally.
